info.narration: #0 enters $0's containment unit to begin work.

collection.name: Foehn
collection.openText: The red wind could be seen in the air, containing within it an agony brighter than blazing fire.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work results were normal or bad, The Qliphoth Counter immediately decreased.
The Qliphoth Counter lowered every time 5 employees died.
For each employee killed by $0 while it had escaped, its existence was extended by 10 seconds and their damage dealt increased by 2.
If $0 defeated an Abnormality while it had escaped, $0 immediately returned to its containment and lowered its Qliphoth Counter by 1.
When finished working with $0, if the employee's HP was lower than 50% and the work result was good, Qliphoth Counter increased immediately.
